source:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_00Muna Vanu seems unimpressed with huts in Ok' Gundu Nakki.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ナッキ島のムナバヌは、冒険者に協力してほしいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_01According to Muna Vanu, their resident hut builder, Ginu Vanu, is in need of assistance to continue his work. Speak with him to see what you can do to help.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

ムナバヌから、ギヌバヌの話を聞いてほしいと頼まれた。ナッキ島の「大工のギヌバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_02<tab>Ginu Vanu feels that his work so far is too plain. He insists that Ok' Gundu Nakki needs something unique to set it apart from other settlements, and he has a plan to make it happen. For his idea to work, however, he needs special stones taken from the living masses of rock known as groundsreapers. He asks that you travel to the eastern region of the Blue Window and slay them for building material.
target: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_02<tab>ギヌバヌから、建材として使う立派なグランズキーパーの石を取ってきてほしいと頼まれた。ブルーウィンドウの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9E9501 /var>」で周囲を見渡し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F211EF01 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BFB01 /var>」を2つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_03<tab>You make swift work of two groundsreapers and retrieve a golem wart from each. Take them to Ginu Vanu, and see if they suit his needs.
target: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BFB01 /var>を2つ入手した。ナッキ島の「大工のギヌバヌ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BFB01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_04<tab>Ginu Vanu is thrilled to see you have brought him material in near-perfect condition. As he tells it, the groundsreapers, birthed from the soil of islands, sustain themselves using rain and other rocks for sustenance. With building blocks that can essentially feed on bad weather, Ginu Vanu is all but certain the next hut he builds will be the envy of all Vanu villages.
target: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_SEQ_04<tab>ギヌバヌに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BFB01 /var>を渡した。彼によると、立派なグランズキーパーの石は風雨に強く、耐久性も高いため、建材として使うのに最適なのだそうだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location and destroy groundsreapers to obtain golem warts.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_TODO_01で見渡して
現れたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the golem warts to Ginu Vanu.
target: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_TODO_02<tab>大工のギヌバヌに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BFB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_MUNAVANU_000_000<tab>Like rays of sun, fortune shines upon Muna Vanu. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> comes at most opportune time. Ginu Vanu needs help with building new hut and could make use of netherling's skills. Speak with him and see what must be done.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_MUNAVANU_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さま、すみませんがご足労いただけますか？
ギヌバヌが、貴方の力を借りたいと言っておりまして。
良ければ、彼の話を聞いてくだされ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_010<tab>So, this is Gundu's new home? Hmmm...Ginu Vanu thinks village needs something extra. Like rainbow cloud in summer sky, Ok' Gundu Nakki should catch eyes of all Vanu.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_010やあ、やあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
僕たちは、ここにグンドの集落を作っているわけだけど、
村には果てなき雲海のように立派な建物が必要だと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_011<tab>That is why Ginu Vanu plans to build a majestic hut of stone, and needs the sturdiest there is─rocks from groundsreaper golems. Please netherling, travel to islands far in the east, and collect their rocks for the Gundu's new hut.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_011そして、そして、立派な建物には、立派な石材が必要だ。
「ブルーウィンドウ」で立派なグランズキーパーを見つけて、
その身体の石を採ってきてくれないかな……お願いだよ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_012<tab>Rocks from groundsreapers make great hut. It shines like single ray of sun through stormy clouds.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_012「ブルーウィンドウ」で立派なグランズキーパーを見つけて、
その身体の石を採ってきてくれないかな……お願いだよ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_020<tab>Hut of stone tower over all like redwood among maple, taller than any other village's. But Ginu Vanu cannot start without groundsreaper rocks.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_020待ってたよ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
嵐に耐える大木のように立派な石は取ってこれたかい？

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_021<tab>Smooth, and very little weathering. Netherling does well─these stones make perfect hut.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_021おお！　想像以上に立派な石だ！
これなら、これなら、立派な家が建てられる！

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_022<tab>Groundsreapers are children of islands. For thirst they drink rain. For sustenance they breathe clouds and eat soil. Then, after many years, they return to ground and become one with earth, like rejoining family.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_022)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、知ってるかい？
グランズキーパーは雨を飲み、雲を吸い、土を食べて育ち、
そして寿命を迎えると、崩れ落ちて浮島の土になるんだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_023<tab>Netherling brings stones from very young groundsreapers. They hold firm against wind and drink rain to stay strong. Where storm would damage normal hut, this hut grows like tree basking in sunlight.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_023だから、身体が立派な若いグランズキーパーの石は、
水を吸っても弱ることもなく、風にも負けぬ強さを持っている。
建材としては、草木に降り注ぐ陽光のように最適なんだよ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_025<tab>Impressive, yes? Ginu Vanu cannot make big house of metal like netherlings, but huts in Ok' Gundu Nakki will be just as good. Just as tough.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN302_02186_GINUVANU_000_025どうだい、どうだい、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
金属を造るヒトもすごいけど、
自然の恵みを用いる僕らもあなどれないだろ？
